code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Testimonials.css";import leftarrow from"../../assets/leftArrow.png";import rightarrow from"../../assets/rightArrow.png";import{testimonialsData}from"./testimonialsData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Testimonials(){const[selected,setSelected]=useState(0);const tlenght=testimonialsData.length;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Testimonials",id:"testimonials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonials-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stroke-text",children:"WHAT THEY"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"SAY ABOUT US"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" ",testimonialsData[selected].review]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{color:"var(--orange)"},children:[testimonialsData[selected].name," "]})," ","- ",testimonialsData[selected].status]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonials-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:testimonialsData[selected].image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"arrows",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:leftarrow,onClick:()=>{selected==0?setSelected(tlenght-1):setSelected(prev=>prev-1);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:rightarrow,onClick:()=>{selected==tlenght-1?setSelected(0):setSelected(prev=>prev+1);}})]})]})]});}export default Testimonials;
